original_title: Visual Velocity: The Work of Stan VanDerBeek
overview: Visual Velocity is a tribute to the pioneering work of Stan VanDerBeek. VanDerBeek was an experimental filmmaker, artist, animator, and media visionary. Produced by David Donnelly, the work originally aired on PBS stations' THE TERRITORY, the longest running public television showcase of independent film/video in the country.
title: Visual Velocity: The Work of Stan VanDerBeek
